long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Google Chrome extension uses the power of GPT-3 to detect and automatically clean up racial slurs, profanity, bullying, and harassment on the web. It provides a safe and secure browsing experience for people of all ages, helping to create a more respectful online environment.

At this stage the Chrome Extension would redirect you to https://app.detoxify.social/, where you will be able to clean and copy the new message.
